items.content_html: ‚ö†Ô∏è EXPERIMENTAL - ts_df, short for Typescript Dataframe, is a simple lightweight application library for parsing csv, tsv and other delimited file, for statistical, and SIMD (single instruction / multiple data) operations on multivariate datasets. Think pandas but written in Typescript and developed on the Bun.js Runtime.

Think pandas but written in Typescript and developed on the Bun.js Runtime.
